channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy SVG Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy SVG Support

item.title: CVE-2022-1964|2024-08-03T00:24:43.600Z -- unknown -- easy%20svg%20support
item.description: The Easy SVG Support WordPress plugin before 3.3.0 does not sanitise uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads
